amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce Rural Housing Assistance Grants by $20,480,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce Rural Housing Assistance Grants by $20,480,000 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A019) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A019) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
